ValidationRule.description: Outage Status is a mandatory field when Affected Service is selected and Blackout period is not. Selecting Blackout period will make Outage Status optional.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( BMCServiceDesk__Affected_Service__c <> null, BMCServiceDesk__Affected_Service__c <> '', BMCServiceDesk__Blackout__c = false, ISPICKVAL(BMCServiceDesk__Service_Status__c,'') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Outage Status is a mandatory field when Affected Service is selected and Blackout period is not.
